page.title: 12Ven House
page.content: As you leave Milborne Port to go to Shaftesbury you will see the fine mansion known as Ven. The house was built in 1700 by James Medlycott and is one of the finest brick built houses of its time.There is an impressive cedar lined drive and the original orangery is still in use.The interior has had few changes made to it even though it has been used as a family home. For a long time it was the seat of the Medlycott family and was sold as recently as the second World War. Since this time it has changed hands several times.For a while it was used as a horticultural center but it is now a private family dwelling. The house is surrounded by landscaped park land and farms.
